name: DROPT INC.
description: Provider of technology platform that converts photos into storefronts. The company provides a Web and mobile application to create shoppable, trackable photos, and operates a Web-content bank enabling brands to release monetizable images directly to publishers.
one_liner: Provider of technology platform that converts photos into storefronts. The company provides a Web and mobile application to create shoppable, trackable photos, and operates a Web-content bank enabling brands to release monetizable images directly to publishers.
